thread.title: 23 Magazine Stories That Really Need To Explain Themselves
thread.title_full: 23 Magazine Stories That Really Need To Explain Themselves

author: Tahlia Pritchard
title: 23 Magazine Stories That Really Need To Explain Themselves
text:

Take 5 Sounds like one for the moo-vies.
Sorry.
ID: 10548707 2. This message from the grave: View this image ›
Take 5 Did he live?!
ID: 10548719 3. This really questionable parent: View this image ›
Take 5 WHY?!
ID: 10548721 4. This story that… like… I just don’t even know: View this image ›
That’s Life Same though.
ID: 10548774 5. This story that I honestly really need to know the details about, ASAP: View this image ›
That’s Life Please, tell me how I can do this.
ID: 10548771 6. This reincarnation: View this image ›
Take 5 Proof that men are always annoying.
ID: 10548718 7. This guide on how to approach your crush: View this image ›
Dolly “Yum! Have you tried the party pies yet? Oh right sorry, I actually ate them all and I really gotta get out of here before fucking Pitbull plays.”
ID: 10540259 8. This article that teaches you the best method for keeping your man: View this image ›
Dolly Make sure to feed him, but never let him out of the cage!
ID: 10548787 9. These revenge tactics: View this image ›
Dolly Yes, some of these aren’t borderline illegal or anything.
ID: 10548790 10. This question: View this image ›
That’s Life I don’t know what to say, Rachel.
ID: 10548796 11. This story that asks the important question… but why?! View this image ›
Take 5 Is revenge really that sweet?
ID: 10559325 12. This extreme method: View this image ›
Take 5 I can relate, times are tough.
ID: 10559327 13. This example of the lengths people will really go to: View this image ›
Take 5 I hope you cleaned them.
ID: 10559341 14. This friendship for the ages: View this image ›
reallyreallife.tumblr.com Same, and his name is hot chips.

reallyreallife.tumblr.com Saucy minx.

reallyreallife.tumblr.com Explain yourself Jeff!
ID: 10559476 17. This woman… who seems to be in love with a tree: View this image ›
reallyreallife.tumblr.com And they say size doesn’t matter.
ID: 10559478 18. This questionable tip for getting your partner in the mood: View this image ›
Cosmopolitan Men are like flies after all.
ID: 10559482 19. And this one: View this image ›
Cosmopolitan Except just eat the donut and be done with it, hey.
ID: 10559606 20. This unplanned soup: View this image ›
reallyreallife.tumblr.com Can I get a refund?

reallyreallife.tumblr.com One unexpected delivery.

Tahlia Pritchard is a senior writer for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
